title: Citi Wins Multiple FX Week Best Bank Awards
summary: New York - Citi has won awards in eight different categories at the annual FX Week's Best Bank awards, which were presented on November 20 in London following the FX Week Europe conference.
tag-1: Citi Wins Multiple FX Week Best Bank Awards
tag-3: New York – Citi has won awards in eight different categories at the annual FX Week's Best Bank awards, which were presented on November 20 in London following the FX Week Europe conference.
tag-4: As the benchmark for performance in the global FX industry, the FX Week Best Banks Awards are the most accurate indicator of who is leading the market, according to banks, corporate treasuries and investors.

tag-6: "Citi has a long standing and successful FX franchise, and this industry recognition is representative of the successful execution of our strategy to constantly innovate and we strive to ensure that our offerings always remain at the cutting edge of the market," said Itay Tuchman, Global Head of FX. "We will continue to build on this success and we will continually challenge ourselves to meet our clients' increasing needs for greater visibility, control and automation."
tag-7: "We are extremely pleased to have won these prestigious industry awards as we build on the momentum of our franchise," said Flavio Figueiredo, Head of Rates and Currencies Corporate Sales. "The fact that our clients have recognized the work that we're doing for them is really rewarding, and we thank them for their ongoing support."
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions.
